titleStmt.title: The last lamentation, of the languishing Squire: or, Love overcomes all things. To the tune of Billy and Molly: or, Jockey's jealousie. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Black [sic],

notesStmt.note: Verse: "As I went forth to view the spring ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
